parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name that you want to track. You can specify up to 500 domain names in each request. If you specify multiple domain names, separate them with commas (,). If you do not specify a domain name, operations reports are updated for all domain names in your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the operations report. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: ReportIds
parameters.description: The IDs of operations reports that you want to update. Separate IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the operations report. Specify the time in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
